sentences.en: An anonymous bidder by telephone to 10.325 million to it.
sentences.cn: 一名匿名投标人通过电话以10.325万英镑成功拿到它.

sentences.en: Egan: We sold our shields off to the highest bidder.
sentences.cn: 吉米.伊根: 我们把我们的保护者卖给了出价最高的那个人.

sentences.en: Few men have the virtue to withstand the highest bidder.
sentences.cn: 很少人有这个德行去抵挡出价最高的人.

sentences.en: Lesson 5 -- Never forget that the lowest bidder made your weapon.
sentences.cn: 别忘了你手上的武器是由 出价 最低的制造商提供的.

sentences.en: Never forget that the lowest bidder made you weapon.
sentences.cn: 别忘了你手上的武器是由最低价的承包商中标制造的.

sentences.en: Never forget those the lowest bidder did your weapon.
sentences.cn: 别忘了你手上的武器是由出价很低的承包商制造的.

sentences.en: Not accurate bidding is main reason of failing to be successful bidder.
sentences.cn: 投标报价不准确是投标失败的主要原因.

sentences.en: one of 13 bidders for the contract
The antiques will be sold to the highest bidder (=  the person who offers to pay the most  ) .
sentences.cn: 这些古董将卖给出价最高的人。

sentences.en: The bidder withdrew his bid after submission of his bid.
sentences.cn: 投标者在投标之后撤销了投标书.

sentences.en: The house went to the highest bidder , ie the person who offered the most money.
sentences.cn: 房子卖给了出价最高的人.

sentences.en: The last Bidder's offer trumped that of all the others.
sentences.cn: 最后一位出价者的出价胜过前面任何一位.

sentences.en: The sale will be made to the highest bidder subject to a reserve price being attained.
sentences.cn: 只要达到了拍卖底价，标的物就会出售给出价最高的竞买人。

sentences.en: This bidder gave an even higher price than the others do.
sentences.cn: 这个出价人给的价钱比其他人更高.

sentences.en: TV franchises will be auctioned to the highest bidder.
sentences.cn: 电视特许经营权将拍卖给出价最高的投标人.

sentences.en: Winning bidder is responsible for all shipping & handling costs.
sentences.cn: 中标人负责所有运费 和 装卸费用.

sentences.en: Winning bidder must pay within 10 days of auction closing.
sentences.cn: 中标者必须支付拍卖结束后10天.

trans.tran_cn: 出价者，投标人，命令者，嘱咐者，[牌]叫牌人
trans.tran_en: someone who offers to pay a particular amount of money for something that is being sold
